nodes.text: Unidentified B1 battle droid 3  (Munificent-class star frigate)
A B1-Series battle droid was stationed on the bridge of General Grievous's Munificent-class star frigate in 22 BBY.

During the Battle of the Rishi moon, this battle droid informed Grievous that the reinforcement squadron sent to retake the listening post had run into some difficulties with a few remaining clone troopers. Grievous then ordered the droid to tell the squadron to wipe them out.
